item.description:
Oh my gosh! I ate here on September 22nd and was blown away! Fantastic food, terrific ambiance, and service with a smile! The prices are very affordable considering the decor and taste of the food. The sake is out of this world! Please check out the website and join us as we enjoy some of the best sushi I've ever tasted!
The reservation is under Kelly.

http://minghungcuisin...

P.S. I love the Snow Roll...apple, cream cheese, and smoked salmon all fried in tempura!

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Min Ghung Asian Bistro
